notice.ch: 大學部學生選修及格後請辦理抵免；大三大四可選修

remark.ch: 大學部學生選修及格後請辦理抵免；大三大四可選修

goal.ch:
1. 學生將具備C/C++程式設計能力。

2. 學生將了解程式設計師的迷因文化。

3. 學生將學會如何和ChatGPT合作寫程式完成專案。
goal.en:
1. Students will be able to design C/C++ programs.
2. Students will understand programmers‘ meme culture.
3. Students will learn how to cowork with ChatGpt for programming projects.

outline.ch:
本課程以程式為主，應用的內容包含遊戲與機器人，搭配程式作業與期末計畫。期末計劃學生需設計程式，應用可為遊戲、機器人或其他應用。(期末計畫最多2人一組)
1.Introduction to programming
2.Data storage: IO and Arithmetic
3.Data type: Bit, Char, String, Structure
4.Program control (If else, while)
5.Program control (for, switch)
6.Function
7.Array
8.Pointer
9.Midterm
10.ROS
11.   How to build large projects.
How to work with Chat GPT
12C++: Class I
13C++: Class II
14C++: Overloading
15C++: Inheritance
16C++: Polymorphism
17C++: Data structure STL
18Final project presentation
2021 Final project demo 影片:
https://youtu.be/ThSNljCJOxY
2023 Spring project demo 影片:
https://youtu.be/y6sSgafRZV8
outline.en:
This course focuses on  programming. The applications include games and robotics with the programming assignments and final project. Students should design programs for games, robots or other applications in the final project. (Two students in one group.)
1.Introduction to programming
2.Data storage: IO and Arithmetic
3.Data type: Bit, Char, String, Structure
4.Program control (If else, while)
5.Program control (for, switch)
6.Function
7.Array
8.Pointer
9.Midterm
10.ROS
11.   How to build large projects.
How to work with Chat GPT
12C++: Class I
13C++: Class II
14C++: Overloading
15C++: Inheritance
16C++: Polymorphism
17C++: Data structure STL
18Final project presentation
2021 Final project demo video:
https://youtu.be/ThSNljCJOxY
2023 Spring project demo video:
https://youtu.be/y6sSgafRZV8

textbook.ch:
曾國師老師的講義。

Textbook:
1. Harvey M. Deitel, Paul J. Deitel, Deitel, “C How to Program,“  8th edition, Prentice Hall, 2015.

2. Paul J. Deitel, Deitel, “C++ How to Program,“  8th edition, Prentice Hall, 2011.

3. Madhav Sanjay, “Game Programming in C++: Creating 3D Games,“ Addison-Wesley, 2018.

4. YoonSeok Pyo, HanCheol Cho, RyuWoon Jung, TaeHoon Lim, “ROS Robot Programming,“ Robotis, 2017.
textbook.en:
Prof. Kuo-Shih Tseng‘s lecture notes.
Textbook:
1. Harvey M. Deitel, Paul J. Deitel, Deitel, “C How to Program,“  8th edition, Prentice Hall, 2015.
2. Paul J. Deitel, Deitel, “C++ How to Program,“  8th edition, Prentice Hall, 2011.
3. Madhav Sanjay, “Game Programming in C++: Creating 3D Games,“ Addison-Wesley, 2018.
4. YoonSeok Pyo, HanCheol Cho, RyuWoon Jung, TaeHoon Lim, “ROS Robot Programming,“ Robotis, 2017.

gradMethod.ch:
30％ 上機小考 (15次)

30％ 期中考 (第9周,可帶sample code)

40％ 期末計畫 (第17~18周)
- 10％ proposal
- 10％ demo
- 20％ report
gradMethod.en:
30％ Mini-test (15 times)
30％ Midterm ( can take sample code)
40％ Final project
- 10％ proposal
- 10％ demo
- 20％ report

ch: 系所:限數學系碩士班、數學系博士班。
系所:限數學系、理學院學士班。
學制:限學士班、碩士班、博士班。
en: Department:MSc in Mathematics、PhD in Mathematics only.
Department:Department of Mathematics、Joint Science Program only.
